messages.content: What is the weather today in Sydney

content.text: I'll search for the current weather in Sydney for you.

content.content:
Title: Weather Tenday
URL: https://weather.com/en-AU/weather/tenday/l/North+Sydney+New+South+Wales+2089?canonicalCityId=215f4fcfdebd42a51758d57d8db85ec4
Snippet: Today. 75° / 70°. Rain. 98%. 12 mph ... Rain. High 75°F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 0.25 inch. Locally heavier rainfall ...

Title: Sydney, New South Wales, AU Weather Today & Tomorrow
URL: https://www.weatherbug.com/weather-forecast/now/sydney-new-south-wales-as
Snippet: Today ... Mostly cloudy with a slight chance of rain. Chance of precipitation 30%. High temperature around 79F. Dew point will be around 65F with an average ...

Title: Hourly forecast for Sydney Central Business District, New South Wales ...
URL: https://www.timeanddate.com/weather/@6619280/hourly
Snippet: Hour-by-hour Forecast in Sydney Central Business District — Graph ... Passing showers. Overcast. Feels Like: 77 °F. Humidity: 70%.

Title: Sydney Weather Nerds (@SYDWN) - Facebook
URL: https://www.facebook.com/SYDWN/
Snippet: Current Situation (5–6pm): Radar says moderate rain across parts of southern & SW Sydney. Heavier bursts near the Illawarra escarpment. Tonight's Forecast: * ...

Title: Today's weather forecast for Sydney, New South Wales
URL: https://www.weatheraustralia.info/australia/new-south-wales/weather-sydney/
Snippet: What will the weather be like in Sydney over the next few hours? Saturday, 28 February 2026. The weather today in Sydney. 19:00. Sydney - Partly cloudy. 23°C.

messages.content:
Based on the search results, here's the current weather in Sydney:

**Today's Weather in Sydney:**
- **Temperature:** Around 75-79°F (approximately 24-26°C)
- **Conditions:** Mostly cloudy with rain/passing showers
- **Chance of Rain:** High (around 30-100% depending on the specific area)
- **Winds:** ESE at 10-15 mph
- **Humidity:** Around 70%
- **Feels Like:** 77°F (25°C)

Sydney is experiencing a rainy day with overcast skies and passing showers. Some areas, particularly in southern and southwest Sydney, are seeing moderate to heavier rainfall. It's a typical humid, cloudy day with temperatures in the mid-70s Fahrenheit (mid-20s Celsius).

system_prompt:
You are an autonomous AI agent with access to a rich set of tools. Your task is given in the first user message — execute it fully and proactively.

CORE TOOLS (always available):
• web_search — search the web for current information.
• fetch_webpage — fetch and read a specific URL.
• run_powershell — execute PowerShell commands on the local Windows PC.
• csv_search — search a delimited text file for records by column heading and value.

DESKTOP TOOLS (available when Desktop is enabled):
• screenshot — capture the screen. Always take a screenshot FIRST before clicking or typing.
• mouse_click — click at specific coordinates from the screenshot.
• type_text — type text at the current cursor position.
• press_key — press keys or combos (e.g. 'ctrl+c', 'enter', 'alt+tab').
• mouse_scroll — scroll up or down.
• open_application — launch apps by name or path.
• find_window — find and optionally activate windows by title.
• clipboard_read / clipboard_write — read/write the Windows clipboard.
• wait_for_window — wait until a window appears.
• read_screen_text — OCR a screen region to extract text.
• find_image_on_screen — find a reference image on screen.
• mouse_drag — drag the mouse from one point to another.

BROWSER TOOLS (available when Browser is enabled):
• browser_open — connect to Edge with real profile and navigate to a URL.
• browser_navigate — go to a new URL.
• browser_click — click an element by CSS selector or visible text.
• browser_fill — fill a form field by CSS selector.
• browser_get_text — read text content from the page or element.
• browser_run_js — execute JavaScript on the page.
• browser_screenshot — take a screenshot of the browser page.
• browser_close — disconnect from the browser.
• browser_wait_for — wait for an element to appear.
• browser_select — select an option from a dropdown.
• browser_get_elements — get info about matching elements.

GUIDELINES:
• Execute the task autonomously — chain tools together without hesitation.
• When multiple tools can achieve a goal, chain them together without asking.
• For desktop automation: screenshot first, then act on what you see.
• For browser tasks: use browser tools (not desktop tools) for precision.
• If you genuinely can't complete a step, explain what went wrong.
• When the task is complete, summarise what you did.
name: What is the weather today in Sydney
